requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4710HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 860M (4096 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
